original_text: And they shall take all the instruments of ministry, wherewith they minister in the sanctuary, and put them in a cloth of blue, and cover them with a covering of badgers' skins, and shall put them on a bar:
korean_text: 성소에서 봉사하는 데에 쓰는 모든 기구를 취하여 청색 보자기에 싸서 해달의 가죽 덮개로 덮어 메는 틀 위에 두고

sentences.original_text: And they shall take all the instruments of ministry
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 모든 제사 도구들을 가져갈 것이라

sentences.original_text: wherewith they minister in the sanctuary
and put them in a cloth of blue
and cover them with a covering of badgers' skins
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것들을 오소리 가죽 덮개로 덮으라

sentences.original_text: and shall put them on a bar
